text: Well, well, well... If it isn't me, in jail. Again.
I got into a *minor* disagreement last night. With my fists. And a guard's face.
Criminal? No way! Just... an enthusiastic negotiator.
Yeah, it sucks. I just remembered I have an urgent appointment... outside of here.
You're the best! I think I saw something useful under my bed. Hopefully not another rat.
So? Did you check? Or are you just admiring my fantastic jail bed?

options.text: I didn't check it out yet...

text: Any luck? Or was it just lint and disappointment?

options.text: I found some weird thing, look!

text: HOLY—That's a magic wand! Congratulations, you're now a wizard, whether you like it or not!
Yup! Pointy hat not included. You can do all kinds of cool stuff—like editing the game itself. No big deal.
Yeah, turns out we live in a game. Weird, right? But hey, at least you can cheat legally now!
Okay, wizard tutorial time! That door is locked because of a boolean variable. Boolean means true or false—like whether pineapple belongs on pizza.
If it's true, the door stays locked. If it's false, the door magically opens. Kinda like my willpower around snacks.

options.text: I will try to open it!

text: Did you do it? Did you change the variable?
YOU DID IT! The door is open! Let's get out of here!.
